title: CreateEvent
description:
This message is used to set up an event.   Field 1 is a local request ID that the event provider returns in the Confirm or Reject message.  Field 2 is the Event Type, which allows the requester  to specify the type of event, where Periodic specifies that the event is a service connection request and should not be queued, in which case field 3 (Requested periodic rate) must be set to a non-zero value.  Event type of Every Change specifies that the corresponding Report message should be sent every time the data associated with that message changes.  
      Field 4 contains the size of the Query message that is to specify the contents of the Report.  Field 5 contains the Query message (including its two byte header).

MessageID.comment: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

RequestID.comment: Local request ID for use in confirm event

RequestedPeriodicRate.comment: Must be specified for periodic event, and set to 0 for every change

QueryMessage.comment: The JAUS Query message to be used by the receiving component to generate the report message(s)

payloadMessageId.comment: message id of the payload message

payload.comment: The JAUS Query message to be used by the receiving component to generate the report message(s)
